title: reform of Section 702
extract: The High Stakes of Misunderstanding Section 702 Reforms. In less than a month, Section 702 of the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act (FISA) is set to expire. ... As many Lawfare readers are aware, Congress enacted Section 702 in July 2008 as part of the FISA Amendments Act.Dec 6, 2017
extract_html: The High Stakes of Misunderstanding Section 702 Reforms. In less than a month, Section 702 of the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act (FISA) is set to expire. ... As many Lawfare readers are aware, Congress enacted Section 702 in July 2008 as part of the FISA Amendments Act.Dec 6, 2017
